incidents.name: MMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in the US

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery failures when sending to multiple networks in the US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on 30% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: Beginning at 04:54am UTC, we observed 30% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect using backup IMSIs. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues with Billing Services

incident_updates.body: The issue with Billing where SMS sent via use of Verify/Authy 2FA products are mixed together with SMS sent via use of Programmable SMS is operating normally at this time.

The issue with Billing where SMS sent via use of Verify/Authy 2FA products are mixed together with SMS sent via use of Programmable SMS is now operating normally. We are continuing to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with Billing where SMS sent via use of Verify/Authy 2FA products are mixed together with SMS sent via use of Programmable SMS is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified the issue with Billing where SMS sent via use of Verify/Authy 2FA products are mixed together with SMS sent via use of Programmable SMS. This issue is cosmetic and does not cause the wrong amount to be billed. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as information becomes available.

We have identified the issue with Billing where SMS sent via use of Verify/Authy 2FA products are mixed together with SMS sent via use of Programmable SMS. This issue is cosmetic and does not cause the wrong amount to be billed. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as information becomes available.

incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue with Twilio Rest API have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

We are no longer experiencing issues with Phone Numbers, MMS, Studio, the Console and the Flex platform. Customers may have seen 5xx errors in the console. Studio didn’t show the status callback URL pointed to Studio as well. Voice webhooks may have been missed, leading to stuck executions. This only affected new customers. Finally, customers may have not been able to complete console signups. We are observing recovery but we’ll continue to monitor for service stability. We'll provide an update in 30 minutes.

We were experiencing issues with Phone Numbers, MMS, Studio, the Console and the Flex platform. Customers may have seen 5xx errors in the console. Studio didn’t show the status callback URL pointed to Studio as well. Voice webhooks may have been missed, leading to stuck executions. This only affected new customers. Customers may have not been able to complete console signups. We are observing recovery but we’ll continue to monitor for service stability. We'll provide an update in 30 minutes.

We are currently investigating errors for the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services.  Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

For customer support assistance, please log in to your Twilio or Twilio SendGrid account and submit a support ticket.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We were experiencing issues with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services. We've consolidated the following StatusPage post: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/s2z3c0w3348j. More details about the impact we'll be provided in that StatusPage post.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Phone Numbers, Studio, and Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Phone Numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Programmable Wireless SMS Commands Delivery Delays

incident_updates.body: Between 21:36 PDT and 22:46 PDT, we have observed Mobile Originated (MO) and Mobile Terminated (MT) Programmable Wireless SMS Commands being delayed and/or dropped (with failed status). The issue has been identified and resolved. We are now seeing traffic being delivered again without any delays. This incident has been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential delays with programmable wireless commands delivery. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: 500 Errors on Flex Custom Plugins

incident_updates.body: Twilio Functions & Assets was degraded for 30 minutes between 05:00 and 05:30 Pacific Time on 26/04/2023. During this period of time, a subset of customers may have experienced 5xx while fetching assets for plugins. Flex Insights was not impacted and was usable for customers during this time. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Functions & Assets. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
